name: AI Agent Factory - Cursor Agent Integration
description: Comprehensive MCP server for Cursor Agent to access and manage all AI Agent Factory platform components

tools.name: get_platform_status
tools.description: Get comprehensive status of all platform components and services
tools.use_case: When you need to understand the current state of the entire AI Agent Factory platform

tools.name: list_prds
tools.description: List all PRDs in the system with optional status filtering
tools.use_case: When you need to see what PRDs are available for processing

tools.name: get_prd_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific PRD by ID
tools.use_case: When you need to understand the requirements for creating an agent

tools.name: create_prd
tools.description: Create a new PRD in the system
tools.use_case: When you need to add a new PRD to the platform

tools.name: update_prd_status
tools.description: Update the status of a PRD (queue, in-progress, completed, failed)
tools.use_case: When you need to track PRD progress through the workflow

tools.name: list_agents
tools.description: List all agents in the system with optional status filtering
tools.use_case: When you need to see what agents have been created

tools.name: get_agent_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific agent by ID
tools.use_case: When you need to understand an agent's configuration and status

tools.name: deploy_agent
tools.description: Deploy an agent to Google Cloud Run
tools.use_case: When you need to deploy a new agent to production

tools.name: create_github_repo
tools.use_case: When you need to create a repository for agent code

tools.name: get_github_repo
tools.description: Get information about a GitHub repository
tools.use_case: When you need to check repository status or details

tools.name: test_database_connection
tools.use_case: When you need to verify database connectivity

tools.name: get_database_schema
tools.description: Get the current database schema information
tools.use_case: When you need to understand the database structure

tools.name: validate_environment
tools.use_case: When you need to check if all services are properly configured

tools.name: start_backend_server
tools.use_case: When you need to run the backend API locally

tools.name: start_frontend_server
tools.use_case: When you need to run the frontend locally

workflow.step_1: Use 'get_platform_status' to understand current system state
workflow.step_4: Use 'create_github_repo' to create repository for agent
workflow.step_5: Use 'deploy_agent' to deploy agent to Google Cloud Run

integration_notes.cursor_agent: This MCP server provides comprehensive access to all AI Agent Factory components from Cursor Agent
integration_notes.environment: All environment variables are pre-configured for immediate use
integration_notes.services: Includes access to Supabase, GitHub, OpenAI, and Google Cloud services
integration_notes.development: Can start both backend and frontend servers for local development
